title: Yongnuo YN-468 II i-TTL Speedlite Flash With LCD Display, for Nikon
description:
Professional Flash Speedlight Yongnuo YN 468II for Nikon CameraThe Yongnuo Speedlite YN-468II shoe-mount flash is well-designed to work with 
Canon DSLR cameras. The Yongnuo shoe-mount flash can be coupled with the Canon 
cameras to capture clean and crisp photographs even in poor light conditions. 
The Nikon DSLR cameras flash mount has a super fast recycle time of 3s that 
allows you to take more photographs continuously using the flash. The flash head 
of the Yongnuo shoe-mount flash can be swiveled up, right or left to capture the 
photographs from different angles. The flash controls of this Yongnuo Speedlite 
YN-468II can be made through the camera's LCD screen. The Nikon DSLR cameras 
flash mount comes with the guide number of 33 to offer you powerful flash. The 
TTL auto flash or manual Level 8 controls the luminance in the Yongnuo Nikon 
Speedlite YN-468II so that you can capture clean and crisp photographs in this 
Yongnuo shoe-mount flash.YN468II is a brand new flash specially designed for professional creative 
photography. YN468II has some advanced applications. It uses inbuilt flash or 
top-mounted flash as master flash. The flash can realize the high-speed 
continuous shooting function. It has the rear-curtain sync function. Pull out 
the wide-angle diffusion board, push back the reflection board and arrange them, 
this function can reach optimal effect when the flasher head is up90, and the 
flash effect will be softer and more natural.Suitable for:Nikon camera with the standard hot-shoe.Nikon D700 , D5100, D5000Nikon D300, D300S,D7000,D90,D80Nikon D70,D70S,D60,D3000,D3100Package includes:1 Yongnuo YN468II Speedlight1 Protecting Bag1 Mini Stand1 Manual (English and Chinese)
